## ğŸ“¥ Installation

1. ### ğŸš° Tap this repo

   ```shell
   brew tap 5ouma/cask
   ```

1. ### ğŸ¥« Install preferred applications

   - #### [â—»ï¸ Aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org)

     ```shell
     brew install aseprite
     ```

